availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joel D. Browning (Hopkins County KY saddler and jailer (1840s))

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, jailer and saddler. Kentucky native. Jailer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1844. Jailer in Hopkins County in 1847. Saddler in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 240.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 221A.
Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky: Passed at December Session, 1843(Frankfort, Ky.: A. G. Hodges, 1844), 194.
Taliaferro P. Shaffner, ed., The Kentucky State Register, for the year 1847 (Louisville: Morton & Griswold, 1847), 103.
